name: The lost ninja
description:
The lost ninja roams through the land. His name forgotten, his honor lost.  There is only way to obtain succes. The way of the sword.  Brave Brave Ninja strike your sword, drop your bombs. You are lost, but hope is not.

this game was made for the nesgamejam2018

controls:

Z - slash, X - drop bomb, arrow keys - move
                                  

music:  Rolemusic_-_Itsumo_no_y_ni                                                                                                                art:  FinalGateStudios
